shared.filt

Class PrincipalComponentAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.filt.PrincipalComponentAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSetFilter, ReversibleFilter

    public class PrincipalComponentAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReversibleFilter
    A filter that performs PCA on a set of data
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu

      • PrincipalComponentAnalysis

        public PrincipalComponentAnalysis(DataSet dataSet,
                          double varianceToKeep)
        Make a new PCA filter
        Parameters:
        varianceToKeep - The % variance to keep. This assumes that sum(eigenvalues) represents all of the variance, and
        dataSet - the set form which to estimate components
